aston.group17.model

Class Pump

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.group17.model.Pump

  • public class Pump
extends java.lang.Object
    A Pump which contains a queue of Drivers, belongs to a Station instance and allows Driver to refill their Vehicle
    Version:
    2017.5.3
    Author:
    Kieran Gates, Mitch Feaver, Zak Hersi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pump(double price, int pumpNumber)
      A pump which will contain a queue of Drivers and will be used to fill vehicles using fuel, set to a price by the Station

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Allows the first Driver in the Pump's queue to act if the Driver is still at the pump and needs to refuel If the Driver is done they will be removed from the Pump's queue
      void addToPumpQueue(Driver driver)
      Adds a driver to the pump queue, assigns the Driver their pump number and reduces the Pump's unitSpaceAvailable according to the Driver's Vehicle's unitSize
      Driver getFirstDriver()
      Returns the first driver in the pump queue (the one at the pump itself)
      double getQueueFree()
      Returns the value of unitSpaceAvailable.
      java.util.ArrayList<Driver> getVehicleQueue()
      Returns list of vehicles in the pumps queue
      double isFull(double size)
      Checks that the pump is not full and can fit the Vehicle, denoted by its size.
      void removeDriver()
      Removes a Driver from the Pump's queue, adding to the Pumps unitSpaceAvaiable according to the Driver's Vehicle's unitSize
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method overwriting the original toString
      boolean willVehicleFit(double size)
      Checks if the vehicle will fit inside the queue

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pump

        public Pump(double price,
            int pumpNumber)
        A pump which will contain a queue of Drivers and will be used to fill vehicles using fuel, set to a price by the Station
        Parameters:
        price - Price of fuel
        pumpNumber - Number pump at the Station

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Allows the first Driver in the Pump's queue to act if the Driver is still at the pump and needs to refuel If the Driver is done they will be removed from the Pump's queue

      • isFull

        public double isFull(double size)
        Checks that the pump is not full and can fit the Vehicle, denoted by its size.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the Vehicle that is being compared against the queue
        Returns:
        Size of the queue if the Vehicle entered it. returns 0.0 if Vehicle will not fit

      • getQueueFree

        public double getQueueFree()
        Returns the value of unitSpaceAvailable. The amount of space left at the Pump's queue
        Returns:
        value of unitSpaceAvailable

      • addToPumpQueue

        public void addToPumpQueue(Driver driver)
        Adds a driver to the pump queue, assigns the Driver their pump number and reduces the Pump's unitSpaceAvailable according to the Driver's Vehicle's unitSize
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver to be added

      • removeDriver

        public void removeDriver()
        Removes a Driver from the Pump's queue, adding to the Pumps unitSpaceAvaiable according to the Driver's Vehicle's unitSize

      • getVehicleQueue

        public java.util.ArrayList<Driver> getVehicleQueue()
        Returns list of vehicles in the pumps queue
        Returns:
        Queue field, containing ArrayList of Drivers

      • getFirstDriver

        public Driver getFirstDriver()
        Returns the first driver in the pump queue (the one at the pump itself)
        Returns:
        First driver in queue

      • willVehicleFit

        public boolean willVehicleFit(double size)
        Checks if the vehicle will fit inside the queue
        Parameters:
        size - Vehicle size that will be compared against the queue
        Returns:
        Boolean which is true if vehicle can fit in pump queue, false if not

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method overwriting the original toString
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
